page1.title: About
page1.content: sciml-dmi is a community of researchers and practitioners at DMI which are excited about applying machine learning in their work. Our primarily interests focus around weather and climate in Denmark and abroad. Please get in touch if you’d like to collaborate or present your work to our work community. .
